parse: Noun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and krino; to conclude for oneself, i.e. to respond; by Hebraism to begin to speak.

parse: Conjunction
str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Pluperfect Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To know, remember, appreciate.

parse: Article - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Noun - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: A (free) gift, a gift (without repayment). From doron; a gratuity.

parse: Noun - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Verb - Aorist Infinitive Active
str2: To drink, imbibe. A prolonged form of pio, which poo occurs only as an alternate in certain tenses; to imbibe.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To ask, request, petition, demand. Of uncertain derivation; to ask.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.

parse: Noun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Water. And genitive case, hudatos, etc. From the base of huetos; water literally or figuratively.
